overview:
Paul Sebastien is the Chief Marketing Officer & SVP at cloud/SaaS apps company SugarSync (www.sugarsync.com).

Formerly VP at mobile/social gaming powerhouse Tapulous (acquired by Disney) where he ran several top mobile & social apps and franchises including, notably, the #1 iPhone & Android franchise “Tap Tap Revenge”.

Prior, he has co-founded two Silicon Valley companies including Beatnik Inc. with Thomas Dolby, the first internet music company, and held senior product, creative and business leadership roles at Microsoft (Xbox LIVE), Sony, Excite@Home, and the Kleiner/Vinod Khosla-backed Zaplet.

Paul is also a Platinum Record Award-winning music producer, musician and founder of popular 1990’s electronica band Psykosonik (of Mortal Kombat fame) and Basic Pleasure Model.
